myChat

Class ServerCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • myChat.ServerCode

  • public class ServerCode
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the "backend" code of the server GUI, all of the methods and implementations which the server has, occuring here
    Author:
    Evgeny

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Vector<MultiClientHandler> allConnected 
      static int port 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerCode() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void allOnline(MultiClientHandler sender)
      in case client wants to see every member of the chat whose online, this method creats the string outout and sends it only to the requseting client
      void close()
      close servers socket in case the server is shut down
      static void Connect(java.lang.String name, MultiClientHandler origin)
      in case a client wants to connect, this method checks whether the name of client is in use, if not adds the thread which works with it to the vector and lets all clients know that new user is connected
      static void disConnect(java.lang.String name)
      in case a client wants to disconnect, this method deletes clients thread from the vector and sending the message about it to all clietns
      static void messageAll(java.lang.String senderName, java.lang.String message)
      sends given message to all online memebers
      static void privateMessage(java.lang.String senderName, java.lang.String recivingName, java.lang.String message, MultiClientHandler origin)
      sends a message to chosen client (if there is one with the same user name)
      void start(javax.swing.JTextArea textToGui)
      sets all servers fields, connects the "textToGui" to GUI's JtextArea, declares the vector and starts "lestning" to the port (without any code blocking using a thread)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(javax.swing.JTextArea textToGui)
        sets all servers fields, connects the "textToGui" to GUI's JtextArea, declares the vector and starts "lestning" to the port (without any code blocking using a thread)
        Parameters:
        textToGui -

      • close

        public void close()
        close servers socket in case the server is shut down

      • Connect

        public static void Connect(java.lang.String name,
                           MultiClientHandler origin)
        in case a client wants to connect, this method checks whether the name of client is in use, if not adds the thread which works with it to the vector and lets all clients know that new user is connected
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the client
        origin - a referense to the thread thats wroking with the client, we'll use this if clients name is already taken to sent him a personal message

      • disConnect

        public static void disConnect(java.lang.String name)
        in case a client wants to disconnect, this method deletes clients thread from the vector and sending the message about it to all clietns
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the client we wish to delete

      • allOnline

        public static void allOnline(MultiClientHandler sender)
        in case client wants to see every member of the chat whose online, this method creats the string outout and sends it only to the requseting client
        Parameters:
        sender - requesting clients thread, used to send the information back easier

      • messageAll

        public static void messageAll(java.lang.String senderName,
                              java.lang.String message)
        sends given message to all online memebers
        Parameters:
        senderName - the name of the client who send the message
        message - the String messagse itself

      • privateMessage

        public static void privateMessage(java.lang.String senderName,
                                  java.lang.String recivingName,
                                  java.lang.String message,
                                  MultiClientHandler origin)
        sends a message to chosen client (if there is one with the same user name)
        Parameters:
        senderName - name of the user who sent the message
        recivingName - the user name of who the message is to
        message - the String message itself
        origin - the thread from which we got this message
